hierarchy.level_3: an ancient Roman coin with a circular shape and a greenish patina
hierarchy.level_4: a circular, round, Roman coin with a rough, textured surface covered in greenish corrosion and reddish patches, lying on a flat surface
hierarchy.level_5: a circular, round, Roman coin with a greenish patina and red corrosion, likely made of bronze, lying on a white surface with a 1cm ruler below it
